name: Cavern Hopper (Flappy Bird clone)
description:
My first game, made as practice to help learn unity 4 months ago. I revisited it and touched it up with some UI elements and bug fixes. Help the pilot navigate the random pillars of an ancient cavern...using the power of explosions. 

Basically flappy bird but with a different aesthetic.

Update 14/07/2022: Added selection bar for different jump intensities.
